obsoleteSchemaMessage: The following formats are no longer supported on the Biosafety Clearing-House. For more information, please visit bch.cbd.int or contact bch@cbd.int :
partyToCp: Party to the Cartagena Protocol on Biosafety
inBetweenToCp: Ratified, not yet Party to the Cartagena Protocol on Biosafety
nonPartyToCp: Not a Party to the Cartagena Protocol on Biosafety

inBetweenToConvention: Ratified, not yet Party to the Convention
